name: Nintendogs + Cats
description:
Nintendogs + Cats is a game developed by Nintendo. It was originally released in 2011. Nintendo published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Nintendogs + Cats is available on Nintendo 3DS.
Hideki Konno produced the game. Yasuyuki Oyagi directed the game. Asuka Hayazaki scored the game.
